analysisEngineMetaData.name: POS Density Feature: Modifier
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
Calculates density of modifier the text. Modifier are adverbs and adjectives and include for English: the Penn Treebank tags JJ, JJR, JJS, RB, RBR, RBS, WRB for German: the Tiger tag ADV, ADJA, ADJD. for Dutch: the CGN tags Adj, Adv
Formula: modDensity = numModifier / numTokens
AAE dependency: SentenceAnnotator.xml TokenAnnotator.xml NTokenFeature.xml POSAnnotator.xml
